nodes.text: Together with Haber Trell, the two traders and their ship unknowingly got involved in a devious scheme devised by none other than Grand Admiral Thrawn. Their ship was called the Hopskip. Together with Thrawn they go on a mission, without knowing how he really was. Both, Trell and Maranne, thought Thrawn was the bounty hunter Jodo Kast.
Maranne has long, dark blonde hair and dark blue eyes and was considered pretty.
"Shipping with her can't be too rough. She's pretty easy on the eyes."
She also seems to be a good shot.
She along with Haber were most likely killed when the Hopskip was destroyed in the Battle of Derra IV although no mention was made to who was on board at the time.
